name: Forgotten Lectures - Fall of a Dynasty
name_original: Forgotten Lectures - Fall of a Dynasty
description:
Over the years I've created many smaller sci-fi and fantasy based settings and stories but till recently I've never found a proper way to share it with the masses. I never found the time to write books and by not having any artistic drawing talens what so ever it seemed hopeless. But in Spring 2022 I rediscovered the medium of visual novels and after some technical research I found the proper tools for me to create the necessary art for expressing my ideas. 

Currently I'm doing this in my spare time between my rl job and other obligations of life, but I wouldn't mind if some day I'd be able to reduce my job hours to pour more time into this project, as this is a dream waiting to be realized for a long time.

Feel free to contact me any time. I try to be available on a regular basis but depending on rl job projects it's possible that I'm out of the country and off grid from time to time. But I try to plan ahead for those and in case there's a longer planned absence I'll post that ahead of time. 

The plan

Currently I'm releasing a prologue chapter for the first book. It's a proof of concept to see if it works as I'd like to have it and to see how the general reception is. 

After that I'm planning to release the game chapter wise. But I won't even try to make any promises on a timeline yet. I've still a lot to learn working with 3D tools. 

Also there will be at least 2 versions, maybe later a 3rd. 

1st -  the main story purely from the perspective of the main protagonist.

         you will only see and learn what he sees and influence his path ahead

2nd - basically the same story but in addition with many more scenes for the other

         characters, expanding on the story and putting things into context.

3rd - well maybe a spicier version ;)

As of now the idea is to release version 1 and 2 for free. Maybe later the 3rd or an extended for low budget on steam. 

If you want to support the project feel free to visit my patreon of buymecoffe page ;) Or check out the soon comming merch. I already sell some posters and large scale prints at some local conventions but I'll put up some online soon as well.

Well I guess I've taken enough of your time already.

Thanks a lot and if you like what I'm doing spread the word ;)

And constructive feedback is always welcome. But please, just keep it civilized :)
